{"currentConversationId":"dc5cd811-b98a-47b7-b1a5-1a717789459a","conversations":{"1bbbfd33-8574-4598-8b5e-5ee0a0193afe":{"id":"1bbbfd33-8574-4598-8b5e-5ee0a0193afe","createdAtIso":"2025-07-31T06:39:29.917Z","lastInteractedAtIso":"2025-07-31T07:11:15.355Z","chatHistory":[{"status":"success","request_id":"5c4e2fc9-b7b0-4e8c-a452-5e380bccdac2","request_message":"playwright-java testng ve reportportal entegrasyonlu güzel bir pom.xml hazırlamanı istiyorum. log4j2 vs","rich_text_json_repr":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"playwright-java testng ve reportportal entegrasyonlu güzel bir pom.xml hazırlamanı istiyorum. log4j2 vs"}]}]},"mentioned_items":[],"structured_output_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":0,"content":"Here's an enhanced `pom.xml` for Playwright Java with TestNG and ReportPortal integration:

<augment_code_snippet path="pom.xml" mode="EDIT">
```xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
 xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
 xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
 <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

 <groupId>com.starlettech</groupId>
 <artifactId>core-playwright</artifactId>
 <version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>

 <properties>
 <maven.compiler.source>21</maven.compiler.source>
 <maven.compiler.target>21</maven.compiler.target>
 <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
 <playwright.version>1.42.0</playwright.version>
 <testng.version>7.11.0</testng.version>
 <log4j.version>2.23.1</log4j.version>
 <reportportal.version>5.5.0</reportportal.version>
 <maven.surefire.version>3.2.5</maven.surefire.version>
 <maven.compiler.version>3.12.1</maven.compiler.version>
 </properties>

 <dependencies>
 <!-- Playwright -->
 <dependency>
 <groupId>com.microsoft.playwright</groupId>
 <artifactId>playwright</artifactId>
 <version>${playwright.version}</version>
 </dependency>

 <!-- TestNG -->
 <dependency>
 <groupId>org.testng</groupId>
 <artifactId>testng</artifactId>
 <version>${testng.version}</version>
 </dependency>

 <!-- Log4j2 Core -->
 <dependency>
 <groupId>org.apache.logging.log4j</groupId>
 <artifactId>log4j-core</artifactId>
 <version>${log4j.version}</version>
 </dependency>

 <dependency>
 <groupId>org.apache.logging.log4j</groupId>
 <artifactId>log4j-api</artifactId>
 <version>${log4j.version}</version>
 </dependency>

 <dependency>
 <groupId>org.apache.logging.log4j</groupId>
 <artifactId>log4j-slf4j2-impl</artifactId>
 <version>${log4j.version}</version>
 </dependency>

 <!-- ReportPortal -->
 <dependency>
 <groupId>com.epam.reportportal</groupId>
 <artifactId>agent-java-testng</artifactId>
 <version>${reportportal.version}</version>
 </dependency>

 <dependency>
 <groupId>com.epam.reportportal</groupId>
 <artifactId>logger-java-log4j</artifactId>
 <version>5.2.2</version>
 </dependency>

 <!-- Utilities -->
 <dependency>
 <groupId>com.fasterxml.jackson.core</groupId>
 <artifactId>jackson-databind</artifactId>
 <version>2.17.0</version>
 </dependency>

 <dependency>
 <groupId>org.apache.commons</groupId>
 <artifactId>commons-lang3</artifactId>
 <version>3.14.0</version>
 </dependency>
 </dependencies>

 <build>
 <plugins>
 <plugin>
 <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
 <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
 <version>${maven.compiler.version}</version>
 <configuration>
 <source>21</source>
 <target>21</target>
 </configuration>
 </plugin>

 <plugin>
 <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
 <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
 <version>${maven.surefire.version}</version>
 <configuration>
 <suiteXmlFiles>
 <suiteXmlFile>src/test/resources/testng.xml</suiteXmlFile>
 </suiteXmlFiles>
 <systemPropertyVariables>
 <rp.endpoint>${rp.endpoint}</rp.endpoint>
 <rp.uuid>${rp.uuid}</rp.uuid>
 <rp.launch>${rp.launch}</rp.launch>
 <rp.project>${rp.project}</rp.project>
 </systemPropertyVariables>
 </configuration>
 </plugin>
 </plugins>
 </build>

 <profiles>
 <profile>
 <id>reportportal</id>
 <properties>
 <rp.endpoint>http://localhost:8080</rp.endpoint>
 <rp.uuid>your-uuid-here</rp.uuid>
 <rp.launch>Playwright Tests</rp.launch>
 <rp.project>your-project</rp.project>
 </properties>
 </profile>
 </profiles>
</project>
```
</augment_code_snippet>

Key enhancements:
- Added version properties for better dependency management
- Included ReportPortal logger integration
- Added Jackson for JSON handling
- Added Commons Lang3 for utilities
- Configured Surefire plugin for TestNG execution
- Added ReportPortal profile with configurable properties
- Enhanced Log4j2 setup with core dependency

You'll also need to create `src/test/resources/testng.xml` and ReportPortal configuration files.

````xml path=pom.xml mode=EDIT
 <log4j.version>2.23.1</log4j.version>
 <reportportal.version>5.5.0</reportportal.version>

 <!-- Playwright -->

 </dependency>
 </dependencies>

 <build>

 <plugin>
 <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>

 <version>${maven.compiler.version}</version>
 <configuration>
 <source>21</source>
 <target>21</target>
 </configuration>

 <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
 <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
 <version>${maven.surefire.version}</version>

 <suiteXmlFiles>
 <suiteXmlFile>src/test/resources/testng.xml</suiteXmlFile>

 <properties>

 </properties>
 </profile>
 </profiles>
</project>
````

Key enhancements:
- Added version properties for better dependency management
- Included ReportPortal logger integration
- Added Jackson for JSON handling
- Added Commons Lang3 for utilities
- Configured Surefire plugin for TestNG execution
- Added ReportPortal profile with configurable properties
- Enhanced Log4j2 setup with core dependency

You'll also need to create `src/test/resources/testng.xml` and ReportPortal configuration files.
